code:
flowchart TD
    subgraph "External Systems"
        App["Application / CLI layer"]:::external
        Peer["Remote Peer"]:::external
        Network["Network"]:::external
    end

    subgraph "Utility Modules"
        Config["ConnectionConfig"]:::utility
        Formatter["PacketFormatter"]:::utility
        CargoToml["Cargo.toml"]:::utility
        CargoLock["Cargo.lock"]:::utility
        Readme["README.md"]:::utility
    end

    subgraph "Core Protocol Logic"
        PEC["ProtocolEngine"]:::core
        RM["RetransmissionManager"]:::core
        RB["ReceiveBuffer"]:::core
        TM["TimerManager"]:::core
    end

    subgraph "Transport Layer"
        UDPSocket["UDP Socket Abstraction"]:::transport
    end

    App -->|"start"| PEC
    Config -->|"injected"| PEC
    PEC -->|"format packet"| Formatter
    Formatter -->|"build packet"| UDPSocket
    UDPSocket -->|"send datagram"| Network
    Network -->|"deliver"| Peer
    Peer -->|"send datagram"| Network
    Network -->|"receive"| UDPSocket
    UDPSocket -->|"raw packet"| PEC
    PEC -->|"buffer packet"| RB
    PEC -->|"track packets"| RM
    PEC -->|"set timers"| TM
    TM -->|"timeout event"| PEC
    RB -->|"deliver data"| App

    click App "https://github.com/nafell/echelon-server/blob/main/src/main.rs"
    click PEC "https://github.com/nafell/echelon-server/blob/main/src/protocol.rs"
    click Formatter "https://github.com/nafell/echelon-server/blob/main/src/protocol.rs"
    click RM "https://github.com/nafell/echelon-server/blob/main/src/protocol.rs"
    click RB "https://github.com/nafell/echelon-server/blob/main/src/protocol.rs"
    click TM "https://github.com/nafell/echelon-server/blob/main/src/protocol.rs"
    click UDPSocket "https://github.com/nafell/echelon-server/blob/main/src/protocol.rs"
    click Config "https://github.com/nafell/echelon-server/blob/main/src/protocol.rs"
    click CargoToml "https://github.com/nafell/echelon-server/blob/main/Cargo.toml"
    click CargoLock "https://github.com/nafell/echelon-server/blob/main/Cargo.lock"
    click Readme "https://github.com/nafell/echelon-server/blob/main/README.md"

    classDef core fill:#d4f7c5,stroke:#333
    classDef utility fill:#e2e2e2,stroke:#333
    classDef transport fill:#c5e4f7,stroke:#333
    classDef external fill:#f7d4c5,stroke:#333
repo_description: Vibe Codingでどこまで行けるか試してみるプロジェクト
